Uses of Interface
evaluators.IEvaluationFunction

  • Packages that use IEvaluationFunction 
    Package Description
    evaluators  
    samplers  
    samplers.rollout  

    • Uses of IEvaluationFunction in evaluators

      Classes in evaluators that implement IEvaluationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EvaluationFunction_Constant
      Scores nodes by returning a constant value no matter what node is input.
      class  EvaluationFunction_DeltaDistance
      Evaluation of a node based distance traveled since the last node.
      class  EvaluationFunction_Distance
      Evaluation of a node based strictly on torso horizontal position.
      class  EvaluationFunction_HandTunedOnState
      Implementation of a node evaluation function which is a hand-tuned combination of state information, having to do with torso angle, x position, and x velocity.
      class  EvaluationFunction_Random
      This evaluation function returns a random value regardless of the given node.
      class  EvaluationFunction_SqDistFromOther
      Evaluation of node value based on squared difference in the node's game state from another specified node's state.
      class  EvaluationFunction_Velocity
      Evaluation of a node based strictly on torso horizontal position.
      Methods in evaluators that return IEvaluationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IEvaluationFunction EvaluationFunction_Constant.getCopy() 
      IEvaluationFunction IEvaluationFunction.getCopy()
      Create a copy of this IEvaluationFunction.

    • Uses of IEvaluationFunction in samplers

      Methods in samplers with parameters of type IEvaluationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Sampler_Greedy.setEvaluationFunction(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction)
      Set a new evaluation function for this sampler.
      void Sampler_UCB.setEvaluationFunction(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction)
      Set a new evaluation function for this sampler.
      Constructors in samplers with parameters of type IEvaluationFunction 
      Constructor and Description
      Sampler_Greedy(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction) 
      Sampler_UCB(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction)
      Must provide an evaluationFunction to get a numeric score for nodes after a rollout.
      Sampler_UCB(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction, RolloutPolicy rolloutPolicy)
      Must provide an evaluationFunction to get a numeric score for nodes after a rollout.

    • Uses of IEvaluationFunction in samplers.rollout

      Constructor and Description
      RolloutPolicy_MultiChildren(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction) 
      RolloutPolicy_RandomColdStart(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction) 
      RolloutPolicy_SingleRandom(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction) 
      RolloutPolicy_ValueFunction(IEvaluationFunction evaluationFunction, IValueFunction valueFunction)
